actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to issue letters of marque and reprisal with respect to acts of aggression against the United States by a member of a cartel, or a member of a cartel-linked organization, or any conspirator associated with a cartel, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cartel Marque and Reprisal Authorization Act of 2025

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to issue letters of marque and reprisal with respect to acts of aggression against the United States by a member of a cartel, or a member of a cartel-linked organization, or any conspirator associated with a cartel, and for other purposes.
Cartel Marque and Reprisal Authorization Act of 2025
Cartel Marque and Reprisal Authorization Act of 2025
